thread.title: Blackstone Group Swings to a Loss
thread.title_full: Blackstone Group Swings to a Loss - WSJ

author: Ryan Dezember
title: Blackstone Group Swings to a Loss
text:
Blackstone Group LP on Thursday said it swung to a loss during the third quarter as whipsawing markets reduced the value of its holdings and deal-making activity continued to slow for its private-equity business.
The New York firm reported a third-quarter loss of $255 million, or 40 cents a share, down from a profit of $251 million, or 41 cents a share, in the same period last year.
